Accessibility Statement

This site is committed to providing an experience that functions for the widest possible audience, regardless of technology or ability.

It strives to conform to level AA compliance for the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.2. These are guidelines that explain how to make web content easier to use for disabled people.

The code powering this site is standards-compliant HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Any person using a past, present, or future browser that honors these standards should be capable of navigating this site.

In addition to being tested on modern browsers, this site has been checked for screen reader ease of use using Voice Over, NVDA, and JAWS. It is also audited using WAVE, and axe, and Tenon automated accessibility testing services.

Issues with this site’s accessibility can be submitted as a Git Hub issue, or by emailing me directly. I take these issues very seriously and will try to remedy the problem as quickly as time allows. A list of known reported issues is also available.

Although I cannot guarantee that all content linked to, or embedded on this site is fully accessible, I try to choose sites and services that embrace Inclusive Design principles.
